title: Madrigals for Diana [c17] (Hyperion / Kirkby) [MP3] [twistle]
description:
A (discontinued) CD with some lesser-known madrigals included in the mix.  Tracks 18 and 19 are especially beautiful songs.

Tracks 14-17 are missing, and the original CD I have long mislaid, however this still comes to a respectable 47mins of music.  The lost tracks were not particularly tuneful in any case.

MP3 VBR ~192K

__

Madrigals and Wedding Songs for Diana (Hyperion)
Emma Kirkby (soprano) / Anthony Rooley (lute) et al.
Consort of Musicke
